column5: My home is close to Downtown, The Riverwalk, The Alamo, The Zoo, Museum of Art, The Historic Pearl featuring restaurants, shopping, fine dining and so much more. I live in a quiet and peaceful neighborhood. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the ambiance. Plus it's about 5 minutes (in a car) from Downtown. Your room has a mini fridge, microwave & coffeemaker. column8: Cozy & clean room with private bath near Downtown
